content: --वंशः (प्राग्वंशः) {1} a kind of sacrificial room having its columns turned towards the east; <ls>R. 15. 61</ls> (प्राचीनस्थूणो यज्ञशालाविशेषः <ls>Malli.</ls>; but some interpret the word to mean ‘a room in which the friends and family of the sacrificer assemble’). {2} a former dynasty or generation.
